metadata.name: speculum
metadata.description:
market days  
it happens once a year in my hometown  
a long weekend to kick off the summer season  
a moment of celebration  
a coming together of the local shops and people  
"speculum" 
is a moment captured during these festivities

a solitary woman from above the crowded down town  
taking in the scene below  
framed by the neon lights of the local theatre  
 
who is she?  
what is she watching?  
what is she thinking?  
how does she feel?

we can only imagine
